Performs differential expression between clusters

Source: R/clusters_DE.R
clustering_DE_analysis.Rd

Performs differential expression between clusters

clustering_DE_analysis(
  normalized_data = multimodal$rna_processed,
  colData,
  omic,
  dependent = "Cluster",
  levels = c("CS2", "CS1"),
  log2FoldChange = 0.5
)

Arguments

normalized_data

Normalized rna/protein data

colData

The coldadata variable

omic

protein or mRNA

dependent

The dependent variable

levels

Levels to compare

log2FoldChange

logFC cutoff
